entry.title: Long Weekend Seasonal Blend (Medium Dark) 2250g/ 5lb | Free Shipping
entry.summary:
Vendor: North Roast Coffee Roaster
Type: 2250g/ 5lb Valved Bag

Is there anything we look forward to more than a Long Weekend?  Always fresh from the coffee roaster this favourite has excellent body, mild acidity and perfect balance supplies the boost you need for an extra day of play!  Medium dark roast.

entry.title: Mocha Java Fair Trade Organic 2250g/ 5 lb | Free Shipping
entry.summary:
Vendor: North Roast Coffee Roaster

A world classic recipe dating back to the 1800's features an artfully roasted Fair Trade Organic Ethiopian paired with an earthy, full bodied Fair Trade Organic Sumatra.  Like all of our coffees, we stamp the roasting date on the back of our 100% compostable coffee bag hot from the coffee roaster.
North Roast Coffee, in Kingston Ontario is your Wholesale Fair Trade Organic Coffee Roaster founded in 1997. All orders over $50 qualify for free shipping and there is always free shipping to Kingston and Area with no minimum purchase.

entry.title: Costa Rica La Pastora Tarrazu (Medium Dark) 2250g/ 5lb | Free Shipping
entry.summary:
Vendor: North Roast Coffee
Type: 2250g/ 5lb Valved Bag
Price: 62.50

Founded in 1960, Coope Tarrazu is the largest in Los Santos Tarrazu, a region known for producing the finest coffees in Costa Rica.  The cooperative has approximately 3200 producers and supports them with loans, technical assistance and input price support.

Apricot and Citrus acidity with a well rounded body and excellent balance.  Very pleasant aftertaste.  We stamp each bag with the roast date hot from the coffee roaster.

entry.title: Ethiopia Fair Trade Organic Sidamo Oromia (Medium/Dark) 2250g/ 5lb | Free Shipping
entry.summary:
Vendor: North Roast Coffee
Type: 2250g/ 5lb Valved Bag
Price: 79.75

This Sidamo Oromia exhibits all of the best properties of African Coffees.  The Oromia Coopereative is in a highland region dominated by fertile volcanic soil.  Excellent body, wonderful pit fruit fragrance and lingering clean mouthfeel.

Process:  Washed and Sun dried

Certification:  Fairtrade, Organic

Altitude:  1550-2200 metres

Species:  Arabica

Harvest:  October to January
We stamp the roast date on the back of each compostable coffee bag hot from the coffee roaster.

entry.title: Sumatra Fair Trade Organic PT Harapan Bersama (Dark) 2250g/ 5lb | Free Shipping
entry.summary:
Vendor: North Roast Coffee
Type: 2250g/ 5lb Valved Bag
Price: 75.50



Owing to the Natural Process of drying the beans inside the fruit, this coffee is earthy and sometimes pungent (early in the crop year).  Dry chocolate, light spice and peat provides maximum body for those seeking a BIG taste and persistent mouthfeel.  Everything you'd expect in a classic Sumatran Coffee.

Region:  Gayo Region, Aceh Province

Process:  Semi Washed

Certification:  Fair Trade, Organic

Altitiude:  1200-1600 metres

Varietals:  Bourbon, Timtim, Ateng Super, Catimor 


North Roast Coffee, in Kingston Ontario is your Wholesale Fair Trade Organic Coffee Roaster founded in 1997. All orders over $50 qualify for free shipping and there is always free shipping to Kingston and Area with no minimum purchase.

entry.title: French Roast Fair Trade Organic (Dark) 2250g/ 5lb | Free Shipping
entry.summary:
Vendor: North Roast Coffee
Type: 2250g/ 5lb Valved Bag
Price: 64.75

Our most popular blend is roasted just to second crack (the second time the bean pops and expands in the roaster) indicating a dark roast.  We stop the roast very quickly so the smooth, dark and sweet character makes it into the cup. 

 Knowing how to roast a coffee dark to enhance flavour is a rare skill among coffee roasters.  Many roasters with limited experience roast all coffee light with no regard to where the coffee needs to be roasted.  We know which coffees need to be roasted light, and which dark.  Enjoy!North Roast Coffee, in Kingston Ontario is your Wholesale Fair Trade Organic Coffee Roaster founded in 1997. All orders over $50 qualify for free shipping and there is always free shipping to Kingston and Area with no minimum purchase.

entry.title: Guatemala Fair Trade Organic AAPICAFE (Medium Dark) 2250g/ 5 lb | Free Shipping
entry.summary:
Vendor: North Roast Coffee
Type: 2250g/ 5lb Valved Bag
Price: 64.75

Brought to you by Ontario's original craft Coffee Roaster. 
The location of the coop is in the heart of the growing areas in Huehue. From the City of Huehue it takes about 2 hours to get to the down and requires a 4x4 truck. Using the word rough to describe the road is an understatement.

The average farm size in the region is about 1 hectare.

All the coffee processed individually by each farmer and therefore sun dried in small batches one each farm. You can see in one of the pictures that every bit of flat spaces is used to dry the coffee, even the roof tops.

As the coop is on a slightly north facing side of the range the cool nights mean that the coffee is fermented for longer periods of time ranging up to 48 hours.

  Huehuetenango enjoys high altitude, rich volcanic soils and abundant rainfall creating the perfect environment for world class coffee.  This coffee has very balanced acidity and mild cocoa aroma.  Sweet pears, honey with fruity acidity.  Juicy aftertaste.

 Produced 1500-1800 metres above sea level and harvested from October to March.
North Roast Coffee, in Kingston Ontario is your Wholesale Fair Trade Organic Coffee Roaster founded in 1997. All orders over $50 qualify for free shipping and there is always free shipping to Kingston and Area with no minimum purchase.

entry.title: 24/7 Fair Trade Organic Espresso (Dark) 2250g/ 5lb | Free Shipping
entry.summary:
Vendor: North Roast Coffee
Type: 2250g/ 5lb Valved Bag
Price: 64.75

Hot from the Coffee Roaster, this blend honours classic Italian espresso blends and has a huge body and mouthfeel, with excellent fruity finish at the bottom of the cup.  Espresso needs to sit for at least 2 days before it can be used in an espresso machine because the degassing process creates a very frothy shot if served before it has rested.
